Entries.default: Bile churns within this pit. The fleshy tube nearby pumps the acidic substance into the larger pit in the central chamber.
It reeks, and the fumes burn your eyes.
[Combine the Fungal Ingredient with the Antiseptic Salve and add both to the fluid.]

You carefully mix the materials and dump them into the reservoir. The bile foams and bubbles before curdling into thick goo.

The tube shudders and then chokes, utterly clogged.
The fluid seems highly acidic. It will quickly dissolve anything introduced to it - though it would likely react extremely poorly to a strong base.
